description: Unlocks housing tiers 4 and higher.
Gives +1 melon per melon broken.
Increases the speed of faster cooking and faster selling from 5 to 8.
You get more gold from jailing players that have contraband on them.
Deposits of gold into the city bank adds an extra 0.25 gold to the bank for free.
The time you spend in jail is reduced by 3 seconds, and you can only be jailed at 8 health rather than at 10 health.
You get +1 gold from selling melons.
Strange brews give one extra effect and heal one extra heart.
You get more gold and golden carrots from collecting imports.
If you have your banks unlocked, you generate 1 enchanted melon slice for every 8 seconds you're on the plot.
You have a +0.1 boost to sell price when you sell melons to the merchant.
Stranger brews take 100 less seconds to make.
You unlock the Expert Shop.
You get a 10% discount when crafting hoes.
Attempting to enter the Black Market opens the door for twice as long as it usually does.
You slowly but passively generate gold for your personal bank while farming.
If faster cooking/selling are not bought, sneaking increases the speed of cooking/selling respectively from 1 to 2.
You gain access to the extra area in the Arcane Workshop.
Your Emergency Grenades come with a free sword.
Your autosmelter smelts melons 50% faster.
The Searching statistic on your hoe becomes 0.4% per level instead of 0.3%
Your autosmelter will also autosell any shady melon slices you have.
Imports has a chance to grant you basic armor if you do not already have it.
You get a 10% discount when enchanting hoes.
The trinket store has an expanded stock, and the hunter's store can be opened.
While sneaking, your autosmelter smelts melons 2 times as fast.
Dark Power automatically activate when bought if you are a citizen. While they are active, your passive gold gain from farming is slightly boosted.
Nothing
The Gathering statistic on your hoe becomes 15% per level instead of 10%.
Nothing
Your Emergency Grenades come with a free crossbow and some arrows.
Nothing
You have your own personal imports buffer that nobody else can take from, and you can sneak while taking imports to do so twice as fast.
Nothing
The Movement statistic on your hoe becomes 10% per level instead of 8%.
Nothing
Deposits of gold into the city bank adds another 0.25 gold to the bank for free.
Nothing
If faster cooking/selling are not bought, sneaking increases the speed of cooking/selling respectively from 2 to 3.
Nothing
All players have a 30% chance for a +0.1 sell price bonus while you are online. This chance caps at 100% when 4 or more people with this upgrade are online.
Increases the speed of faster cooking and faster selling from 8 to 12.
Most enchants have their percentages boosted by 1.15x.
You gain access to @bank, which lets you carry up to 10000 gold.
You gain access to @forge, a powerful menu with easy access to a lot of features.
